articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Epic Games says Apple’s new install process cuts user drop-offs by 60% - TechCrunch
articles.description: The company noted that this drop rate is closer to the rate it observes with Windows and macOS users installing its game store.
articles.content:
Fortnite maker Epic Games said that Apple’s new installation workflow, implemented in iOS 18.6, has had a positive impact on its user growth, with a 60% decrease in drop-offs.
Apple started allowing… [+2479 chars]
